#include <iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--){
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    
    long long  d;
    cin>>d;
    
    if(d==0){
        cout<<s<<endl;
        
        }else{
        long long i = s.length() - d + 1;
        
        string s2 = s.substr(0, d-1);
        
        string s3 = s.substr(d-1);
        
        if(i & 1){
            reverse(s2.begin(), s2.end());
        }
        s3 += s2 ;
    
        cout<<s3<<endl;
        }    
    }
    return 0;
}
